metadata.title: CVE-2024-24790 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The various Is methods (IsPrivate, IsLoopback, etc) did not work asexpected for IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses, returning false for addresseswhich would return true in their traditional IPv4 forms.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24790` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.18 - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.6+esm1
golang-1.18-go - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.6+esm1
golang-1.18-src - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.6+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: golang-1.10 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.13 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.18 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.18.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.6+esm1').
